p: Overall, little is known about IFN-I response after the PIV infection in human population studies. An early work detected IFN-I in patients with primary PIV infection [ 65]. In vitro experiments have shown that PIV-2 induced IFN- α by day 2 postinfection, PIV-3 by day 3, and that PIV-1 did not produce this molecule. IFN- β production was shown to be poor in all serotypes [ 117].
